sentences.english: This scenery is not very beautiful, but a picture of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 這景色不見得很美，卻是一幅秋日風情畫。

sentences.english: God, that was a beautiful sight.
sentences.chinese: 上帝，那是一幅多美的景色。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the breath-taking scene of the moon rising over the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡月亮從海那邊破水而出的景色。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou is a world of water, which brings Jiuzhaigou its most enchanting views.
sentences.chinese: 寨溝是水的天地，水構成了九寨溝最富魅力的景色。

sentences.english: The landscape will get more cluttered, the air and water even dirtier.
sentences.chinese: 景色會變得更加雜亂，空氣和水也會變得愈發骯髒。

sentences.english: And Hainan's mangrove, rich coral reef are also well-known attractions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，海南的紅樹林，豐富的珊瑚礁也是著名的景色。

sentences.english: It was a sight to watch my hairless Sindu walking towards her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 看着我的光頭欣頓走向教室，那真是一大景色。

sentences.english: Guangning is the home of bamboo and famous for its picturesque scenery .
sentences.chinese: 廣寧是著名的竹子之鄉，以優美的自然景色而出名。

sentences.english: The view from my tent only added to my happiness.
sentences.chinese: 從帳篷裏能看到的景色讓我更加快樂。

sentences.english: The charming landscape which I saw this morning, is indubitably made up of some twenty or thirty farms.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我見迷人景色，無疑由二十至三十個農場組成。

sentences.english: It has a very good sunset-over-the-Mekong view.
sentences.chinese: 這也是一個非常美麗的湄公河上日落景色。

sentences.english: The region is remarkable for its woodland scenery.
sentences.chinese: 這地區以森林景色著稱。

sentences.english: City sights, neon lights, grey skys or blue.
sentences.chinese: 都市景色，霓虹燈光，灰或藍天。

sentences.english: Perspective illustration provides a three-dimensional view of objects or views.
sentences.chinese: 透視畫法了對物體或景色的三維視角。

sentences.english: You may have a bird-eye view of the whole city there.
sentences.chinese: 那兒您可以鳥瞰全城的景色。

definition: scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
